Oh you don't know my current friends.
They are seriously sensitive to everything. Kinda like those SJWs or feminists.

... I miss my old friends...

Also, OPM is based on a webcomic.
A terribly drawn one at that.[/bq]
@EGH, IS ONE OF THOSE FRIENDS... YES I CAN UNDESTAND THAT@
@I DIDN'T KNOW OPMAN WAS BASED IN A WEBCOMIC@
@AND IF THE DRAW IS TERRIBLE, THEN NO CHANCES I WILL GONNA READ IT@

"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55233de86368726670e90200#post_55233de86368726670e90200
[bq="trashboat"]"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55233ade6368726375650300#post_55233ade6368726375650300

@THE MORE I KNOW@
